mapper.select: select product_id as productId,title,media_url as mediaUrl from ad_platform where type = #{type} and position = #{position} and status = #{status}

SELECT ap.id AS id, ap.ad_id AS ad_id, ap.position AS position, a.title AS title, a.content AS content, a.video_img_url as video_img_url , a.merchant_store_name as name, a.logo_url as logo_url, a.media_url as media_url FROM ad_platform ap LEFT JOIN ad a ON ap.ad_id = a.id WHERE ap.type = 4 AND ap.ad_id in ( SELECT id FROM ad WHERE status = 2 AND ( ( put_way = 1 AND areas IS NULL )
OR ( put_way = 3 AND merchant_latitude > #{latitude} - 1 AND merchant_latitude < #{latitude} + 1 AND merchant_longitude > #{longitude} - 1 AND merchant_longitude < #{longitude} + 1 AND (#{radius} * 2 * ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{latitude} - merchant_latitude) * PI() / 180 / 2 ), 2) + COS(#{latitude} * PI() / 180) * COS(merchant_latitude * PI() / 180 ) * POW(SIN((#{longitude} - merchant_longitude) * PI() / 180 / 2), 2)))) > radius )
OR ( put_way = 2 AND merchant_id IN #{merchantId} )
OR ( put_way = 1 AND areas IN #{area} )
) ) ORDER BY ap.gmt_create desc
